Text: I got this version of wordsmart about March of 09 but i have seen that a newer version is out there. So if any body wants to share i would appriciate.
Shortcut method: the file you must use to create the shortcut from is "ws.exe"

I can start the wordsmart, but I can't add a new user.  I tried a number of methods including create an ISO and mounting it like CD, but could only enter the application as a guest. Anyone else had this issue?
